snippet: Rush Limbaugh said he was sorry for inflammatory remarks about Sandra Fluke, a Georgetown law student who spoke in favor of President Obama’s birth control policy.
abstract: Rush Limbaugh said he was sorry for inflammatory remarks about Sandra Fluke, a Georgetown law student who spoke in favor of President Obama’s birth control policy.

headline.main: Limbaugh Apologizes for Attack on Student in Birth Control Furor
headline.print_headline: Facing Outcry, Limbaugh Apologizes for Attacking Student Over Birth Control
